en.respDoesNotAdmitAdulteryTitle: Your {{ divorceWho }} has not admitted to committing adultery
en.respDoesNotAdmitAdulteryPar1: As your {{ divorceWho }} has not admitted to adultery, the court will make a judgement based on the information available. This will include the response of the co-respondent if you have named one and any further evidence you provide.
en.respDoesNotAdmitAdulteryPar2: Alternatively, you can change your reason for divorce by amending your application.
en.respDoesNotAdmitAdulteryPar3: You’ll be asked to choose one of these options after you’ve read your {{ divorceWho }}’s response.
en.respDoesNotConsent2YearSepTitle: Your {{ divorceWho }} has not given their consent to a divorce
en.respDoesNotConsent2YearSepYouMustHave: You must have your {{ divorceWho }}’s consent to use the '2 years separation with consent' reason for divorce.
en.respDoesNotConsent2YearSepYouHaveToPay: If you want to continue you need to change your reason for divorce. You’ll have to pay a fee of £{{ amendFee }}. Your application will need to be sent to your {{ divorceWho }} again.
en.respDoesNotConsent2YearSepReadResponse: Read your {{ divorceWho }}’s response on the next page.

cy.respDoesNotAdmitAdulteryTitle: Nid yw eich {{ divorceWho }} wedi cyfaddef cyflawni godineb
cy.respDoesNotAdmitAdulteryPar1: Gan nad yw eich {{ divorceWho }} wedi cyfaddef cyflawni godineb, bydd y llys yn gwneud penderfyniad ar sail yr wybodaeth sydd ar gael.  Bydd hyn yn cynnwys ymateb y Cyd-atebydd os ydych wedi enwi rhywun ac unrhyw dystiolaeth arall rydych wedi’i darparu.
cy.respDoesNotAdmitAdulteryPar2: Fel arall, gallwch newid eich rheswm dros yr ysgariad drwy newid eich cais.
cy.respDoesNotAdmitAdulteryPar3: Fe ofynnir ichi ddewis un o'r opsiynau hyn ar ôl ichi ddarllen ymateb eich {{ divorceWho }}.
cy.respDoesNotConsent2YearSepTitle: Nid yw eich {{ divorceWho }} wedi cydsynio i gael ysgariad
cy.respDoesNotConsent2YearSepYouMustHave: Mae’n rhaid ichi gael cydsyniad eich {{ divorceWho }} i ddefnyddio'r rheswm 'wedi gwahanu ers 2 flynedd gyda chydsyniad’ i gael ysgariad.
cy.respDoesNotConsent2YearSepYouHaveToPay: Os ydych eisiau parhau, bydd angen ichi newid eich rheswm dros fod eisiau cael ysgariad. Bydd rhaid ichi dalu ffi o £{{ amendFee }}. Bydd angen ichi anfon eich cais at eich {{ divorceWho }} eto.
cy.respDoesNotConsent2YearSepReadResponse: Darllenwch ymateb eich {{ divorceWho }} ar y dudalen nesaf.
